title: Beverly Hills
name: Sprinkles
content: Featured on television shows like Good Morning America and the Oprah Winfrey Show, Sprinkles is the place in Los Angeles to get gourmet cupcakes. This increasingly popular dessert takes one of America's favorite baked desserts to a whole new level, offering 10 varieties a day, 5 of which are always available and the remaining 5 of which varies from day to day. Flavors range from the basic (milk chocolate or red velvet) to the exotic (ginger lemon or chai latte). The shop is hugely popular, but also a bit pricey (at $3.50 a pop), so if indulgent desserts are your thing, be sure to make a quick stop here.
